DOC.brief_title: A Community Intervention Trial Multimodal Suicide Prevention Program Japan ( NOCOMIT-J )
DOC.detailed_description: Suicide major public health problem number suicide victim exceed 30,000 year since 1998 Japan . Suicide rate almost 25/100,000 , remarkably high number among advanced country . To examine effectiveness community-based multimodal intervention program suicide prevention , trial J-MISP ( Japanese Multimodal Intervention Trials Suicide Prevention ) . This research project one strategic research project fund The Japanese Ministry Health , Labor Welfare .
DOC.criteria: Areas meet follow criterion eligible study ; An area firm support local government organization conduct multimodal suicide prevention program An area capable select intervention control regions An area capable follow data collection procedure describe protocol An area comparable baseline data suicide attempt rate intervention control region An area comparable baseline data demographic intervention control region
